trans-unit.source: String values may be used as operands of the comparison operators, although the expression evaluator tries to do comparisons as integer or floating-point when it can, i.e., when all arguments to the operator allow numeric interpretations, except in the case of the eq and ne operators. If one of the operands of a comparison is a string and the other has a numeric value, a canonical string representation of the numeric operand value is generated to compare with the string operand. Canonical string representation for integer values is a decimal string format. Canonical string representation for floating-point values is that produced by the %g format specifier of Tcl's format command. For example, the commands
trans-unit.target: 字符串值可以用作比较运算符的操作数，尽管表达式评估器会在可能的情况下（即，当运算符的所有自变量都允许数值解释时）尝试以整数或浮点数进行比较，除非eq和ne运算符。如果比较操作数之一是字符串，而另一个操作数具有数字值，则将生成数字操作数的规范字符串表示形式，以与字符串操作数进行比较。整数值的规范字符串表示形式是十进制字符串格式。浮点值的规范字符串表示形式是Tcl的format命令的％g格式说明符产生的。例如，命令

trans-unit.source: Strings in Tcl are logically a sequence of 16-bit Unicode characters. These strings are represented in memory as a sequence of bytes that may be in one of several encodings: modified UTF-8 (which uses 1 to 3 bytes per character), 16-bit “Unicode” (which uses 2 bytes per character, with an endianness that is dependent on the host architecture), and binary (which uses a single byte per character but only handles a restricted range of characters). Tcl does not guarantee to always use the same encoding for the same string.
trans-unit.target: Tcl中的字符串在逻辑上是16位Unicode字符的序列。这些字符串在内存中以字节序列表示，该字节序列可以采用以下几种编码之一：改进的UTF-8（每个字符使用1到3个字节），16位“ Unicode”（每个字符使用2个字节），取决于主机体系结构的字节序）和二进制文件（每个字符使用一个字节，但仅处理有限范围的字符）。 Tcl不保证始终对相同的字符串使用相同的编码。

trans-unit.source: Strings stored in the message catalog are stored relative to the namespace from which they were added. This allows multiple packages to use the same strings without fear of collisions with other packages. It also allows the source string to be shorter and less prone to typographical error.
trans-unit.target: 存储在消息目录中的字符串是相对于它们被添加的命名空间而存储的。这允许多个包使用相同的字符串,而不用担心与其他包发生冲突。它还允许源字符串更短,更不容易出现排版错误。

trans-unit.source: Substitutes the UNICODE character corresponding to the event, or the empty string if the event does not correspond to a UNICODE character (e.g. the shift key was pressed). XmbLookupString (or XLookupString when input method support is turned off) does all the work of translating from the event to a UNICODE character. Valid only for KeyPress and KeyRelease events.
trans-unit.target: 替换事件对应的UNICODE字符，如果事件不对应UNICODE字符（例如，按下Shift键），则替换为空字符串。XmbLookupString（或在关闭输入法支持时为XLookupString）完成将事件从事件转换为UNICODE字符的所有工作。仅对KeyPress和KeyRelease事件有效。

trans-unit.source: Substitutions do not affect the word boundaries of a command, except for argument expansion as specified in rule [5]. For example, during variable substitution the entire value of the variable becomes part of a single word, even if the variable's value contains spaces.
trans-unit.target: 除了规则[5]中规定的参数扩展外,替换不会影响命令的字界。例如,在变量替换过程中,变量的整个值都会成为一个词的一部分,即使变量的值包含空格。

trans-unit.source: Surprising results may be obtained when crossing a point at which a leap second is inserted or removed; the clock add command simply ignores leap seconds and therefore assumes that times come in sequence, 23:59:58, 23:59:59, 00:00:00. (This assumption is handled by the fact that Tcl's model of time reacts to leap seconds by speeding or slowing the clock by a minuscule amount until Tcl's time is back in step with the world.
trans-unit.target: 当跨越插入或移除removed秒的点时，可能会获得令人惊讶的结果；的时钟附加命令简单地忽略闰秒，因此假定倍进来序列，23时59分58秒，23点59分59秒，00:00:00。（这一假设是通过以下事实来处理的：Tcl的时间模型通过将时钟加速或减慢微小的量来响应leap秒，直到Tcl的时间与世界同步。

trans-unit.source: Suspends processing work on this queue . All pool workers are paused but additional work can be added to the pool . Note that adding the additional work will not increase the number of workers dynamically as the pool processing is suspended . Number of workers is maintained to the count that was found prior suspending worker activity . If you need to assure certain number of worker threads, use the minworkers option of the tpool::create command .
trans-unit.target: 暂停此队列上的处理工作。所有池工作人员均已暂停，但可以将其他工作添加到池中。请注意，由于池处理被挂起，添加额外的工作不会动态增加工作程序的数量。工人人数保持在暂停工人活动之前的数量。如果需要确保一定数量的工作线程，请使用tpool :: create命令的minworkers选项。

trans-unit.source: Tcl includes a library of Tcl procedures for commonly-needed functions. The procedures defined in the Tcl library are generic ones suitable for use by many different applications. The location of the Tcl library is returned by the info library command. trans-unit.source: Test files to be evaluated are sought in the directory configure -testdir. The list of files in that directory that match any of the patterns in configure -file and match none of the patterns in configure -notfile is generated and sorted. Then each file will be evaluated in turn. If configure -singleproc is true, then each file will be sourced in the caller's context. If it is false, then a copy of interpreter will be exec'd to evaluate each file. The multi-process operation is useful when testing can cause errors so severe that a process terminates. Although such an error may terminate a child process evaluating one file, the master process can continue with the rest of the test suite. In multi-process operation, the configuration of tcltest in the master process is passed to the child processes as command line arguments, with the exception of configure -outfile. The runAllTests command in the master process collects all output from the child processes and collates their results into one master report. Any reports of individual test failures, or messages requested by a configure -verbose setting are passed directly on to outputChannel by the master process.
trans-unit.target: 在目录configure -testdir中查找要评估的测试文件。生成并排序该目录中与configure -file中的任何模式匹配但与configure -notfile中的任何模式都不匹配的文件列表。然后将依次评估每个文件。如果configure -singleproc为true，则每个文件将在调用者的上下文中作为源 d。如果是假的，那么副本翻译将EXEC将评估每个文件。当测试可能导致错误严重到导致进程终止时，多进程操作很有用。尽管此类错误可能会终止评估一个文件的子进程，但主进程可以继续测试套件的其余部分。在多处理操作的配置，tcltest在主处理被传递到子进程作为命令行参数，与外配置-OUTFILE。主流程中的runAllTests命令收集子流程的所有输出，并将其结果整理到一个主报表中。任何有关单个测试失败的报告，或configure -verbose设置所请求的消息的任何报告都直接传递到outputChannel 通过掌握过程。

trans-unit.source: Text widgets should run efficiently under a variety of conditions. The text widget uses about 2-3 bytes of main memory for each byte of text, so texts containing a megabyte or more should be practical on most workstations. Text is represented internally with a modified B-tree structure that makes operations relatively efficient even with large texts. Tags are included in the B-tree structure in a way that allows tags to span large ranges or have many disjoint smaller ranges without loss of efficiency. Marks are also implemented in a way that allows large numbers of marks. In most cases it is fine to have large numbers of unique tags, or a tag that has many distinct ranges.
trans-unit.target: 文本小组件应在各种条件下有效运行。文本小组件对每一个字节的文本使用大约2-3个字节的主内存,因此包含一兆字节或更多的文本在大多数工作站上应该是实用的。文本在内部用修改后的B-树结构表示,即使是大文本,操作也相对高效。标签包含在B树结构中,允许标签跨越很大的范围或有许多不相交的较小范围,而不损失效率。标记也是以一种允许大量标记的方式实现的。在大多数情况下,拥有大量独特的标记,或者一个标记有许多不同的范围,都是可以的。

trans-unit.source: The -blocking option determines whether I/O operations on the channel can cause the process to block indefinitely. The value of the option must be a proper boolean value. Channels are normally in blocking mode; if a channel is placed into non-blocking mode it will affect the operation of the chan gets, chan read, chan puts, chan flush, and chan close commands; see the documentation for those commands for details. For non-blocking mode to work correctly, the application must be using the Tcl event loop (e.g. by calling Tcl_DoOneEvent or invoking the vwait command).
trans-unit.target: 所述-blocking选项确定信道的I / O操作是否能够导致进程无限期地阻塞。选项的值必须是正确的布尔值。通道通常处于阻塞模式；如果将通道置于非阻塞模式，则会影响chan gets，chan read，chan puts，chan flush和chan close命令的操作；有关详细信息，请参见这些命令的文档。为了使非阻塞模式正常工作，应用程序必须使用Tcl事件循环（例如，通过调用Tcl_DoOneEvent或调用vwait命令）。

trans-unit.source: The -blocking option determines whether I/O operations on the channel can cause the process to block indefinitely. The value of the option must be a proper boolean value. Channels are normally in blocking mode; if a channel is placed into nonblocking mode it will affect the operation of the gets, read, puts, flush, and close commands by allowing them to operate asynchronously; see the documentation for those commands for details. For nonblocking mode to work correctly, the application must be using the Tcl event loop (e.g. by calling Tcl_DoOneEvent or invoking the vwait command).
trans-unit.target: 所述-blocking选项确定信道的I / O操作是否能够导致进程无限期地阻塞。选项的值必须是正确的布尔值。通道通常处于阻塞模式；如果将通道置于非阻塞模式，则将允许它们异步运行，从而会影响gets，read，puts，flush和close命令的操作；有关详细信息，请参见这些命令的文档。为了使非阻塞模式正常工作，应用程序必须使用Tcl事件循环（例如，通过调用Tcl_DoOneEvent或调用vwait命令）。

trans-unit.source: The -eventmark option, when set, limits the number of asynchronously posted scripts to the thread event loop . The thread::send -async command will block until the number of pending scripts in the event loop does not drop below the value configured with -eventmark . Default value for the -eventmark is 0 (zero) which effectively disables the checking, i .e . allows for unlimited number of posted scripts .

trans-unit.target: 的:: HTTP ::的getURL命令是在封装的主要过程。所述-query选项导致POST操作和-validate选项导致一个HEAD操作; 否则，执行GET操作。该:: HTTP ::的getURL命令返回一个

trans-unit.source: The ::http::geturl procedure will raise errors in the following cases: invalid command line options, an invalid URL, a URL on a non-existent host, or a URL at a bad port on an existing host. These errors mean that it cannot even start the network transaction. It will also raise an error if it gets an I/O error while writing out the HTTP request header. For synchronous ::http::geturl calls (where -command is not specified), it will raise an error if it gets an I/O error while reading the HTTP reply headers or data. Because ::http::geturl does not return a token in these cases, it does all the required cleanup and there is no issue of your app having to call ::http::cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 该:: HTTP ::使用getURL程序将提高在下列情况下错误：无效的命令行选项，一个无效的URL，一个不存在的主机上的网址，或在错误的端口现有主机上的URL。这些错误意味着它甚至无法启动网络事务。如果在写出HTTP请求标头时遇到I / O错误，也会引发错误。对于同步::::: geturl调用（未指定-command），如果在读取HTTP答复标头或数据时遇到I / O错误，则会引发错误。因为:: http :: geturl在这种情况下不会返回令牌，所以它会执行所有必需的清除操作，并且您的应用程序不必调用:: http :: cleanup便不会出现问题。

trans-unit.source: The expr command handles mathematical functions of the form sin($x) or atan2($y,$x) by converting them to calls of the form [tcl::mathfunc::sin [expr {$x}]] or [tcl::mathfunc::atan2 [expr {$y}] [expr {$x}]]. A number of math functions are available by default within the namespace ::tcl::mathfunc; these functions are also available for code apart from expr, by invoking the given commands directly.

trans-unit.target: 的焦点和选择小部件的命令可以被用于确定受影响的一个或多个项目。

trans-unit.source: The load command is not directly used. This restriction is not an actual limitation, as some may believe. Ever since 8.4 the Tcl source command reads only until the first ^Z character. This allows us to combine an arbitrary Tcl script with arbitrary binary data into one file, where the script processes the attached data in any it chooses to fully import and activate the package.
trans-unit.target: 的负荷命令不直接使用。某些人可能认为，此限制不是实际的限制。从8.4开始，Tcl 源命令只读取直到第一个^ Z字符。这使我们可以将任意Tcl脚本与任意二进制数据组合到一个文件中，在该脚本中，脚本将以其选择的方式处理附加数据，以完全导入并激活程序包。

trans-unit.source: The namespace eval and apply commands offer other ways (besides procedure calls) that the Tcl naming context can change. They add a call frame to the stack to represent the namespace context. This means each namespace eval command counts as another call level for uplevel and upvar commands. For example, info level 1 will return a list describing a command that is either the outermost procedure call or the outermost namespace eval command. Also, uplevel #0 evaluates a script at top-level in the outermost namespace (the global namespace).
trans-unit.target: 该命名空间EVAL和应用命令提供其他方式（除了过程调用）是Tcl的命名上下文可以改变。他们将一个调用框架添加到堆栈中以表示名称空间上下文。这意味着每一个的namespace eval命令被视为另一个调用级别uplevel和upvar命令。例如，信息级别1将返回一个描述命令的列表，该命令是最外部的过程调用或最外部的命名空间eval命令。同样，最高级别＃0在最外部名称空间（全局名称空间）的顶级评估脚本。

trans-unit.source: The tk fontchooser command controls the Tk font selection dialog. It uses the native platform font selection dialog where available, or a dialog implemented in Tcl otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 的TK fontchooser命令控制Tk的字体选择对话框。它使用本地平台字体选择对话框（如果可用），或者使用Tcl实现的对话框。

trans-unit.source: The ButtonPress and ButtonRelease events are generated when the user presses or releases a mouse button. Motion events are generated whenever the pointer is moved. ButtonPress, ButtonRelease, and Motion events are normally sent to the window containing the pointer.
trans-unit.target: 的ButtonPress和ButtonRelease事件生成当用户按下或释放鼠标按钮。每当移动指针时，都会生成运动事件。通常将ButtonPress，ButtonRelease和Motion事件发送到包含指针的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The Command and Option modifiers are equivalents of Mod1 resp. Mod2, they correspond to Macintosh-specific modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 该命令和选项调节剂是等效MOD1 RESP。Mod2，它们对应于Macintosh特定的修改键。

trans-unit.source: The Double, Triple and Quadruple modifiers are a convenience for specifying double mouse clicks and other repeated events. They cause a particular event pattern to be repeated 2, 3 or 4 times, and also place a time and space requirement on the sequence: for a sequence of events to match a Double, Triple or Quadruple pattern, all of the events must occur close together in time and without substantial mouse motion in between. For example, <Double-Button-1> is equivalent to <Button-1><Button-1> with the extra time and space requirement.
trans-unit.target: 的双，三重和四改性剂是用于指定双重鼠标点击和其他重复的事件提供了方便。它们会导致特定事件模式重复2、3或4次，并在序列上设置时间和空间要求：要使事件序列与Double，Triple或Quadruple模式匹配，所有事件都必须关闭在一起的时间不长，而鼠标之间没有实质性的运动例如，<Double-Button-1>等同于<Button-1> <Button-1>，但需要额外的时间和空间。

trans-unit.source: The Extended modifier is, at present, specific to Windows. It appears on events that are associated with the keys on the “extended keyboard”. On a US keyboard, the extended keys include the Alt and Control keys at the right of the keyboard, the cursor keys in the cluster to the left of the numeric pad, the NumLock key, the Break key, the PrintScreen key, and the / and Enter keys in the numeric keypad.
trans-unit.target: 目前，“ 扩展”修饰符特定于Windows。它出现在与“扩展键盘”上的键关联的事件上。在美式键盘上，扩展键包括键盘右侧的Alt和Control键，数字键盘左侧的群集中的光标键，NumLock键，Break键，PrintScreen键和/和数字键盘中的Enter键。

trans-unit.source: The FocusIn and FocusOut events are generated whenever the keyboard focus changes. A FocusOut event is sent to the old focus window, and a FocusIn event is sent to the new one.
trans-unit.target: 该的focusIn和事件的内容，只要键盘焦点的变化是产生的事件。一个事件的内容事件被发送到旧的焦点窗口和的focusIn事件被发送到新的。

trans-unit.source: The KeyPress and KeyRelease events are generated whenever a key is pressed or released. KeyPress and KeyRelease events are sent to the window which currently has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 该按键响应和KeyRelease只要按下一个键或释放产生的事件。KeyPress和KeyRelease事件发送到当前具有键盘焦点的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The allrows object command sets the variable designated by the -columnsvariable option (if present) to the result of the columns object command. It then executes the nextrow object command repeatedly until the end of the result set is reached. If nextresults returns a nonzero value, it executes the above two steps (columns followed by iterated nextrow calls) as long as further results are available. The rows returned by nextrow are assembled into a Tcl list and become the return value of the allrows command; the last value returned from columns is what the application will see in -columnsvariable.
trans-unit.target: 所述allrows对象命令设置由指定的变量-columnsvariable选项（如果存在的话）连接到的结果列对象命令。然后，它将重复执行nextrow对象命令，直到到达结果集的末尾。如果nextresults返回一个非零值，则只要有更多结果可用，它就会执行上述两个步骤（列之后是迭代的nextrow调用）。nextrow返回的行被组装到一个Tcl列表中，并成为allrows命令的返回值。从列返回的最后一个值是应用程序将在其中看到的内容-columns变量。

trans-unit.source: The argv0 global variable can be used (in conjunction with the info script command) to determine whether the current script is being executed as the main script or loaded as a library. trans-unit.source: The base64 binary encoding is commonly used in mail messages and XML documents, and uses mostly upper and lower case letters and digits. It has the distinction of being able to be rewrapped arbitrarily without losing information.
trans-unit.target: 该的base64二进制编码的邮件和XML文档，并且大都采用大写和小写字母和数字常用。它的特点是可以任意重新包装而不会丢失信息。

trans-unit.source: The begintransaction object command on a database connection begins a transaction on the database. If the underlying database does not support atomic, consistent, isolated, durable transactions, the begintransaction object command returns an error reporting the fact. Similarly, if multiple begintransaction commands are executed withough an intervening commit or rollback command, an error is returned unless the underlying database supports nested transactions.
trans-unit.target: 数据库连接上的begintransaction object命令开始在数据库上进行事务。如果基础数据库不支持原子，一致，隔离，持久的事务，则begintransaction object命令将返回错误，以报告事实。同样，如果通过一个中间的commit或rollback命令执行了多个begintransaction命令，除非基础数据库支持嵌套事务，否则将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: The bgerror command does not exist as built-in part of Tcl. Instead, individual applications or users can define a bgerror command (e.g. as a Tcl procedure) if they wish to handle background errors.
trans-unit.target: 该bgerror如内置的Tcl命令部分不存在。相反，如果单个应用程序或用户希望处理背景错误，则可以定义bgerror命令（例如，作为Tcl过程）。

trans-unit.source: The body command is used outside of an [incr Tcl] class definition to define or redefine the body of a class method or proc. This facility allows a class definition to have separate "interface" and "implementation" parts. The "interface" part is a class command with declarations for methods, procs, instance variables and common variables. The "implementation" part is a series of body and configbody commands. If the "implementation" part is kept in a separate file, it can be sourced again and again as bugs are fixed, to support interactive development. When using the "tcl" mode in the emacs editor, the "interface" and "implementation" parts can be kept in the same file; as bugs are fixed, individual bodies can be highlighted and sent to the test application.
trans-unit.target: 在[incr Tcl]类定义之外使用body命令来定义或重新定义类方法或proc的主体。此功能允许类定义具有单独的“接口”和“实现”部分。 “接口”部分是一个类命令，其中包含方法，proc，实例变量和公共变量的声明。 “实现”部分是一系列body和configbody命令。如果“实现”部分保存在一个单独的文件中，则可以在修复了一些错误之后一次又一次地获取它，以支持交互式开发。在emacs中使用“ tcl”模式时编辑器中，“接口”和“实现”部分可以保存在同一文件中；由于错误已修复，因此可以突出显示各个正文并将其发送到测试应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The clock add command performs clock arithmetic on a value (expressed as nominal seconds from the epoch time of 1 January 1970, 00:00 UTC) given as its first argument. The remaining arguments (other than the possible -timezone, -locale and -gmt options) are integers and keywords in alternation, where the keywords are chosen from seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, or years, or any unique prefix of such a word.
trans-unit.target: 所述时钟附加上一个值命令进行时钟算术（表示为从1历元时间1970年1月，00:00 UTC标称秒）给出作为它的第一个参数。其余参数（可能的-timezone，-locale和-gmt选项除外）是整数和关键字交替出现，其中关键字是从seconds，minutes，hours，days，days，weeks，months或years或任何唯一的前缀中选择的这个词的意思。

trans-unit.source: The clock format command produces times for display to a user or writing to an external medium. The command accepts times that are expressed in seconds from the epoch time of 1 January 1970, 00:00 UTC, as returned by clock seconds, clock scan, clock add, file atime or file mtime.
trans-unit.target: 的时钟格式命令产生用于显示时刻向用户或写入到外部平台。该命令接受从1970年1月1日的纪元时间00:00 UTC以秒表示的时间，该时间由clock seconds，clock scan，clock add，file atime或file mtime返回。

trans-unit.source: The clock scan command accepts times that are formatted as strings and converts them to counts of seconds from the epoch time of 1 January 1970, 00:00 UTC. It normally takes a -format option that is followed by a string describing the expected format of the input. (See FREE FORM SCAN for the effect of clock scan without such an argument.) The string consists of any number of characters other than the per-cent sign (“%”), interspersed with any number of
trans-unit.target: 该时钟扫描命令接受被格式化为字符串，并把它们转换成从1970年1月1日00:00 UTC的信号出现时间的秒计数时间。它通常采用-format选项，后跟一个字符串，描述输入的预期格式。（有关时钟扫描的效果，请参见FREE FORM SCAN（无格式扫描），不带此类参数。）该字符串由除百分号（“ ％ ”）以外的任意数量的字符组成，并散布有任意数量的

trans-unit.source: The clock command performs several operations that obtain and manipulate values that represent times. The command supports several subcommands that determine what action is carried out by the command.
trans-unit.target: 所述时钟命令执行几个操作即获得和操纵表示倍的值。该命令支持几个子命令，这些子命令确定命令将执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: The columns obect command returns a list of the names of the columns in the result set. The columns will appear in the same order as they appeared in the SQL statement that performed the database query. If the SQL statement does not return a set of columns (for instance, if it is an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement), the columns command will return an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 该列 obect命令返回的结果集的列名的列表。这些列的显示顺序与执行数据库查询的SQL语句中显示的顺序相同。如果SQL语句未返回一组列（例如，如果它是INSERT，UPDATE或DELETE语句），则columns命令将返回一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: The columns object command allows the program to query the connection for the names of columns that exist in a given table. The optional pattern parameter is a pattern to match the name of a column. It may contain the SQL wild-card characters '%' and and whose values are dictionaries. Each of the subdictionaries will contain at least the following keys and values (and may contain others whose usage is determined by a specific database driver).
trans-unit.target: 该列对象命令允许程序来查询列中存在的一个给定的表名称的连接。可选的pattern参数是与列名匹配的模式。它可能包含SQL通配符' ％ '，并且其值是字典。每个子词典将至少包含以下键和值（并且可能包含其他键和值，其用法由特定的数据库驱动程序确定）。

trans-unit.source: The commit object command on a database connection ends the most recent transaction started by begintransaction and commits changes to the database.
trans-unit.target: 数据库连接上的commit object命令结束由begintransaction启动的最新事务，并将更改提交到数据库。

trans-unit.source: The component command is used inside an [incr Tcl] extendedclass/widget/widgetadaptor definition to define components.
trans-unit.target: 该组件命令用于内部的[incr的Tcl] extendedclass /插件/ widgetadaptor定义来定义的组件。

trans-unit.source: The configbody command is used outside of an [incr Tcl] class definition to define or redefine the configuration code associated with a public variable. Public variables act like configuration options for an object. They can be modified outside the class scope using the built-in configure method. Each variable can have a bit of "config" code associate with it that is automatically executed when the variable is configured. The configbody command can be used to define or redefine this body of code.
trans-unit.target: 的configbody命令是用于外部的[增量的Tcl]类定义来定义或重新定义与公共变量相关联的配置的代码。公共变量的作用类似于对象的配置选项。可以使用内置的configure方法在类范围之外修改它们。每个变量可以具有与之关联的一些“ config”代码，该代码在配置该变量时将自动执行。该configbody命令可用于定义或重新定义该主体的代码。

trans-unit.source: The consoleinterp command in the console interpreter allows scripts to be evaluated in the main interpreter. It supports two subcommands: eval and record.
trans-unit.target: 控制台解释器中的consoleinterp命令允许在主解释器中评估脚本。它支持两个子命令：eval和record。

trans-unit.source: The coroutine command creates a new coroutine context (with associated command) named
trans-unit.target: 该协程命令创建一个新的名为协程上下文（具有相关的命令）

trans-unit.source: The delegate command is used inside an [incr Tcl] extendedclass/widget/widgetadaptor definition to delegate methods/procs/options to other objects for handling.
trans-unit.target: 该委托命令在[incr Tcl]扩展类/ widget / widgetadaptor定义中使用，以将方法/过程/选项委托给其他对象进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The delete command is used to delete things in the interpreter. It is implemented as an ensemble, so extensions can add their own options and extend the behavior of this command. By default, the delete command handles the destruction of namespaces.

trans-unit.source: The http package provides the client side of the HTTP/1.1 protocol, as defined in RFC 2616. The package implements the GET, POST, and HEAD operations of HTTP/1.1. It allows configuration of a proxy host to get through firewalls. The package is compatible with the Safesock security policy, so it can be used by untrusted applets to do URL fetching from a restricted set of hosts. This package can be extended to support additional HTTP transport protocols, such as HTTPS, by providing a custom socket command, via ::http::register.
trans-unit.target: 该HTTP包提供了HTTP / 1.1协议的客户端，如在RFC 2616中定义的包实现的GET，POST，HEAD和操作的HTTP / 1.1。它允许配置代理主机以通过防火墙。该程序包与Safesock安全策略兼容，因此不受信任的applet可以使用该程序包从一组受限的主机中提取URL。通过提供自定义套接字命令，可以通过:: http :: register将此包扩展为支持其他HTTP传输协议，例如HTTPS 。

Also, there is no global name by which one can refer to the first interpreter created in an application. Both restrictions are motivated by safety concerns.

trans-unit.source: The itcl::purist variable controls a backward-compatibility mode. By default, this variable is "0", and the window name can be used as an access command in any context. Whenever the unknown procedure stumbles across a widget name, it simply uses "winfo command" to determine the appropriate command name. If this variable is set to "1", this backward-compatibility mode is disabled. This gives better encapsulation, but using the window name as the access command may lead to "invalid command" errors.

trans-unit.source: The namespace ensemble is used to create and manipulate ensemble commands, which are commands formed by grouping subcommands together. The commands typically come from the current namespace when the ensemble was created, though this is configurable. Note that there may be any number of ensembles associated with any namespace (including none, which is true of all namespaces by default), though all the ensembles associated with a namespace are deleted when that namespace is deleted. The link between an ensemble command and its namespace is maintained however the ensemble is renamed.

trans-unit.source: The send command is potentially a serious security loophole. On Unix, any application that can connect to your X server can send scripts to your applications. These incoming scripts can use Tcl to read and write your files and invoke subprocesses under your name. Host-based access control such as that provided by xhost is particularly insecure, since it allows anyone with an account on particular hosts to connect to your server, and if disabled it allows anyone anywhere to connect to your server. In order to provide at least a small amount of security, Tk checks the access control being used by the server and rejects incoming sends unless (a) xhost-style access control is enabled (i.e. only certain hosts can establish connections) and (b) the list of enabled hosts is empty. This means that applications cannot connect to your server unless they use some other form of authorization such as that provide by xauth. Under Windows, send is currently disabled. Most of the functionality is provided by the dde command instead.
trans-unit.target: 该发送命令是潜在的一个严重的安全漏洞。在Unix上，任何可以连接到X服务器的应用程序都可以将脚本发送到您的应用程序。这些传入的脚本可以使用Tcl读取和写入文件，并以您的名字调用子进程。基于主机的访问控制（例如xhost提供的访问控制）特别不安全，因为它允许在特定主机上拥有帐户的任何人都可以连接到您的服务器，如果禁用，则它允许任何地方的任何人都可以连接到您的服务器。为了至少提供少量的安全性，Tk会检查服务器使用的访问控制并拒绝传入的发送，除非（a）xhost样式的访问控制已启用（即，仅某些主机可以建立连接），并且（b）启用的主机列表为空。这意味着，除非应用程序使用其他某种形式的授权（例如xauth提供的授权），否则它们无法连接到服务器。在Windows下，当前禁用发送。大部分功能由dde命令提供。

trans-unit.source: The stackorder command returns a list of toplevel windows in stacking order, from lowest to highest. When a single toplevel window is passed, the returned list recursively includes all of the window's children that are toplevels. Only those toplevels that are currently mapped to the screen are returned. The stackorder command can also be used to determine if one toplevel is positioned above or below a second toplevel. When two window arguments separated by either isabove or isbelow are passed, a boolean result indicates whether or not the first window is currently above or below the second window in the stacking order.
trans-unit.target: 该stackorder命令返回的顶层窗口堆叠顺序，从最低到最高的列表。当传递单个顶级窗口时，返回的列表将递归地包括所有属于顶级的窗口子级。仅返回当前映射到屏幕的那些顶层。该stackorder命令还可以用于确定是否一个顶层位于上方或下方的第二顶层。当传递由isabove或isbelow分隔的两个窗口参数时，布尔结果指示第一个窗口当前是否按堆叠顺序位于第二个窗口之上或之下。

trans-unit.source: The tdbc::mysql::connection create object command supports the -encoding, -isolation, -readonly and -timeout options common to all TDBC drivers. The -encoding option will always fail unless the encoding is utf-8; the database connection always uses UTF-8 encoding to be able to transfer arbitrary Unicode characters. The -readonly option must be 0, because MySQL does not offer read-only connections.

trans-unit.source: The tdbc::odbc driver provides a database interface that conforms to Tcl DataBase Connectivity (TDBC) and allows a Tcl script to connect to any SQL database presenting an ODBC interface. It is also provided as a worked example of how to write a database driver in C, so that driver authors have a starting point for further development.
trans-unit.target: 该tdbc :: ODBC驱动程序提供数据库接口，符合Tcl的数据库连接（TDBC），并允许Tcl脚本连接到任何SQL数据库呈现ODBC接口。它也作为如何用C编写数据库驱动程序的有效示例提供，以便驱动程序作者可以进行进一步的开发。

trans-unit.source: The tdbc::postgres::connection create object command supports the -encoding, -isolation, -readonly and -timeout options common to all TDBC drivers. The -timeout option will only affect connection process, once connected this value will be ignored and cannot be changed after connecting.
trans-unit.target: 该tdbc :: Postgres的::连接创建对象命令支持-encoding，分离所，-readonly和-timeout选项通用于所有TDBC驱动程序。该-timeout选项只会影响连接过程中，一旦连接该值将被忽略，连接后不能更改。

trans-unit.source: The tdbc::postgres driver provides a database interface that conforms to Tcl DataBase Connectivity (TDBC) and allows a Tcl script to connect to a Postgres database.
trans-unit.target: 该tdbc :: Postgres的驱动程序提供数据库接口，符合Tcl的数据库连接（TDBC），并允许Tcl脚本连接到一个Postgres数据库。

trans-unit.source: The tdbc::sqlite3 driver provides a database interface that conforms to Tcl DataBase Connectivity (TDBC) and allows a Tcl script to connect to a SQLite3 database. It is also provided as a worked example of how to write a database driver in Tcl, so that driver authors have a starting point for further development.
trans-unit.target: 该tdbc :: sqlite3的司机提供了数据库接口，符合Tcl的数据库连接（TDBC），并允许Tcl脚本连接到一个sqlite3的数据库。还提供了如何在Tcl中编写数据库驱动程序的有效示例，以便驱动程序作者可以进行进一步的开发。

trans-unit.source: The test command is the heart of the tcltest package. Its essential function is to evaluate a Tcl script and compare the result with an expected result. The options of test define the test script, the environment in which to evaluate it, the expected result, and how the compare the actual result to the expected result. Some configuration options of tcltest also influence how test operates.
trans-unit.target: 该测试命令是的心脏tcltest包。它的基本功能是评估Tcl脚本并将结果与​​预期结果进行比较。测试选项定义测试脚本，评估它的环境，预期结果以及如何将实际结果与预期结果进行比较。tcltest的某些配置选项也会影响测试的运行方式。

trans-unit.source: The thread extension creates threads that contain Tcl interpreters, and it lets you send scripts to those threads for evaluation . Additionaly, it provides script-level access to basic thread synchronization primitives, like mutexes and condition variables .
trans-unit.target: 该线程扩展创建包含Tcl的解释线程，它可以让你发送脚本这些线程进行评估。另外，它提供对基本线程同步原语（例如互斥体和条件变量）的脚本级访问。

trans-unit.source: The tk busy command lets you make Tk widgets busy. This means that user interactions such as button clicks, moving the mouse, typing at the keyboard, etc. are ignored by the widget. You can set a special cursor (like a watch) that overrides the widget's normal cursor, providing feedback that the application (widget) is temporarily busy.
trans-unit.target: 该TK忙命令可以让用户Tk小忙。这意味着小部件将忽略用户交互，例如单击按钮，移动鼠标，在键盘上键入等。您可以设置一个覆盖小部件正常光标的特殊光标（如手表），以提供有关应用程序（小部件）暂时繁忙的反馈。

trans-unit.source: The tk busy command provides a simple means to block keyboard, button, and pointer events from Tk widgets, while overriding the widget's cursor with a configurable busy cursor.
trans-unit.target: 在tk的忙命令提供了一种简单的方法来块键盘，按钮，并从Tk部件指针事件，而具有可配置的忙碌光标覆盖小部件的光标。

trans-unit.source: The tk command provides access to miscellaneous elements of Tk's internal state. Most of the information manipulated by this command pertains to the application as a whole, or to a screen or display, rather than to a particular window. The command can take any of a number of different forms depending on the
trans-unit.target: 在tk的命令提供访问Tk的内部状态的杂元素。该命令操纵的大多数信息都与整个应用程序有关，或者与屏幕或显示器有关，而不是与特定窗口有关。该命令可以采用多种不同形式，具体取决于

trans-unit.source: The tk_getSaveFile command is usually associated with the Save as command in the File menu. If the user enters a file that already exists, the dialog box prompts the user for confirmation whether the existing file should be overwritten or not.
trans-unit.target: 该tk_getSaveFile命令通常与关联保存在命令文件菜单。如果用户输入的文件已经存在，则对话框将提示用户确认是否应覆盖现有文件。

trans-unit.source: The tk_setPalette procedure changes the color scheme for Tk. It does this by modifying the colors of existing widgets and by changing the option database so that future widgets will use the new color scheme. If tk_setPalette is invoked with a single argument, the argument is the name of a color to use as the normal background color; tk_setPalette will compute a complete color palette from this background color. Alternatively, the arguments to tk_setPalette may consist of any number of
trans-unit.target: 该tk_setPalette程序改变传统知识的配色方案。它通过修改现有小部件的颜色并更改选项数据库来做到这一点，以便将来的小部件将使用新的配色方案。如果使用单个参数调用tk_setPalette，则该参数是用作常规背景色的颜色的名称；tk_setPalette将根据此背景色计算出完整的调色板。另外，tk_setPalette的参数可以包含任意数量的

trans-unit.source: The tkwait command waits for one of several things to happen, then it returns without taking any other actions. The return value is always an empty string. If the first argument is variable (or any abbreviation of it) then the second argument is the name of a global variable and the command waits for that variable to be modified. If the first argument is visibility (or any abbreviation of it) then the second argument is the name of a window and the tkwait command waits for a change in its visibility state (as indicated by the arrival of a VisibilityNotify event). This form is typically used to wait for a newly-created window to appear on the screen before taking some action. If the first argument is window (or any abbreviation of it) then the second argument is the name of a window and the tkwait command waits for that window to be destroyed. This form is typically used to wait for a user to finish interacting with a dialog box before using the result of that interaction.
trans-unit.target: 该tkwait的几件事情发生的一个命令等待，然后返回而不采取任何其他行动。返回值始终是一个空字符串。如果第一个参数是变量（或其任何缩写），则第二个参数是全局变量的名称，并且命令等待该变量被修改。如果第一个参数是可见性（或其任何缩写），则第二个参数是窗口的名称，并且tkwait命令等待其可见性状态的更改（如VisibilityNotify事件的到达指示）。此表单通常用于等待新创建的窗口出现在屏幕上，然后再执行某些操作。如果第一个参数是window（或它的任何缩写），那么第二个参数是窗口的名称，并且tkwait命令等待该窗口被销毁。此表单通常用于等待用户完成与对话框的交互，然后再使用该交互的结果。

trans-unit.source: The ttk::treeview widget displays a hierarchical collection of items. Each item has a textual label, an optional image, and an optional list of data values. The data values are displayed in successive columns after the tree label.

trans-unit.source: The update idletasks command is useful in scripts where changes have been made to the application's state and you want those changes to appear on the display immediately, rather than waiting for the script to complete. Most display updates are performed as idle callbacks, so update idletasks will cause them to run. However, there are some kinds of updates that only happen in response to events, such as those triggered by window size changes; these updates will not occur in update idletasks.
trans-unit.target: The update idletasks command is useful in scripts where changes have been made to the application's state and you want those changes to appear on the display immediately, rather than waiting for the script to complete. Most display updates are performed as idle callbacks, so update idletasks will cause them to run. However, there are some kinds of updates that only happen in response to events, such as those triggered by window size changes; these updates will not occur in update idletasks.

trans-unit.source: The update command with no options is useful in scripts where you are performing a long-running computation but you still want the application to respond to events such as user interactions; if you occasionally call update then user input will be processed during the next call to update.
trans-unit.target: 不带选项的update命令在执行长时间计算的脚本中很有用，但您仍希望应用程序对事件进行响应，例如用户交互。如果您偶尔调用update，则在下一次调用update时将处理用户输入。

trans-unit.source: The uuencode binary encoding used to be common for transfer of data between Unix systems and on USENET, but is less common these days, having been largely superseded by the base64 binary encoding.
trans-unit.target: 所述UUENCODE二进制编码曾经是Unix系统之间和USENET数据转让共同的，但是这些天较少见，已经很大程度上是由取代的base64二进制编码。

trans-unit.source: The vsapi element factory creates a new element in the current theme whose visual appearance is drawn using the Microsoft Visual Styles API which is responsible for the themed styles on Windows XP and Vista. This factory permits any of the Visual Styles parts to be declared as Ttk elements that can then be included in a style layout to modify the appearance of Ttk widgets.
trans-unit.target: 该VSAPI元素工厂创建于当前的主题，其外观使用Microsoft视觉样式API负责在Windows XP和Vista的主题风格绘制了新的元素。该工厂允许将任何“视觉样式”部件声明为Ttk元素，然后可以将其包含在样式布局中以修改Ttk小部件的外观。

trans-unit.target: 该winfo命令用于检索有关Tk的管理窗口的信息。它可以采用多种不同的形式，具体取决于

trans-unit.source: The wm manage and wm forget commands may be used to perform undocking and docking of windows. After a widget is managed by wm manage command, all other wm subcommands may be used with the widget. Only widgets created using the toplevel command may have an attached menu via the -menu configure option. A toplevel widget may be used as a frame and managed with any of the other geometry managers after using the wm forget command. Any menu associated with a toplevel widget will be hidden when managed by another geometry managers. The menus will reappear once the window is managed by wm. All custom bindtags for widgets in a subtree that have their top-level widget changed via a wm manage or wm forget command, must be redone to adjust any top-level widget path in the bindtags. Bindtags that have not been customized do not have to be redone.
trans-unit.target: 在WM管理和WM忘记命令可用于执行坞和窗户的对接。用wm manage命令管理窗口小部件之后，所有其他wm子命令都可以与窗口小部件一起使用。只有使用toplevel命令创建的窗口小部件可以通过-menu configure选项具有附加菜单。顶层小部件可以用作框架，并可以在使用wm忘记命令后与其他任何几何图形管理器一起进行管理。当由另一个几何管理器管理时，与顶层窗口小部件关联的任何菜单都将被隐藏。一旦窗口由wm管理，菜单将重新出现。必须重做子树中通过wm manage或wm忘记命令更改其顶层窗口小部件的所有子窗口部件的自定义绑定标签，才能调整绑定标签中的任何顶层窗口小部件路径。未定制的Bindtag不必重做。

trans-unit.source: The Accept header of the request. The default is */*, which means that all types of documents are accepted. Otherwise you can supply a comma-separated list of mime type patterns that you are willing to receive. For example, “image/gif, image/jpeg, text/*”.
trans-unit.target: 请求的接受标头。默认值为* / *，表示接受所有类型的文档。否则，您可以提供一个逗号分隔的，愿意接收的mime类型模式列表。例如，“图像/ gif，图像/ jpeg，文本/ *”。

trans-unit.source: The Aqua/Mac OS X application environment defines a number of additional events that applications should respond to. These events are mapped by Tk to calls to commands in the ::tk::mac namespace; unless otherwise noted, if the command is absent, no action will be taken.
trans-unit.target: Aqua / Mac OS X应用程序环境定义了应用程序应响应的许多其他事件。Tk将这些事件映射到对:: tk :: mac命名空间中的命令的调用。除非另有说明，否则如果没有该命令，将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The Aqua/Mac OS X defines additional dialogs that applications should support.

trans-unit.source: The End key adjusts the view to the bottom (right edge) of the document.
trans-unit.target: 结束键可将视图调整到文档的底部(右边缘)。

trans-unit.source: The End key and Control-e move the insert cursor to the end of the entry and clear any selection in the entry. Shift-End moves the cursor to the end and extends the selection to that point.
trans-unit.target: 结束键和Control-e将插入光标移动到条目的末端,并清除条目中的任何选区。Shift-End键将光标移动到终点,并将选区扩展到该点。

trans-unit.source: The End key, or Control-e, will move the insertion cursor to the end of the entry and clear any selection in the entry. Shift-End moves the cursor to the end and extends the selection to that point.
trans-unit.target: 结束键或Control-e将把插入光标移动到条目的末端,并清除条目中的任何选区。Shift-End键将光标移动到终点,并将选区扩展到该点。

trans-unit.source: The Escape key aborts a menu selection in progress without invoking any entry. It also unposts the menu unless it is a torn-off menu.
trans-unit.target: Escape键可以中止正在进行的菜单选择,而不会调用任何条目。它还可以取消菜单的发布,除非它是一个废弃的菜单。

trans-unit.source: The F10 key may be typed in any window to post the first menubutton under its toplevel window that is not disabled.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何窗口中输入F10键,在其toplevel窗口下发布第一个未被禁用的menubutton。

trans-unit.source: The F16 key (labelled Copy on many Sun workstations) or Meta-w copies the selection in the widget to the clipboard, if there is a selection.
trans-unit.target: F16 键(在许多 Sun 工作站上标为 "复制")或 Meta-w 将小组件中的选择复制到剪贴板(如果有选择)。

trans-unit.source: The F16 key (labelled Copy on many Sun workstations) or Meta-w copies the selection in the widget to the clipboard, if there is a selection. This action is carried out by the command tk_textCopy.
trans-unit.target: 如果有选择，则使用F16键（在许多Sun工作站上标记为“复制”）或Meta-w将小部件中的选择复制到剪贴板。此操作由命令tk_textCopy执行。

trans-unit.source: The F18 key (labelled Paste on many Sun workstations) or Control-y inserts the contents of the clipboard at the position of the insertion cursor.
trans-unit.target: F18键(在许多Sun工作站上标为 "粘贴")或Control-y键在插入光标的位置插入剪贴板的内容。

trans-unit.source: The F18 key (labelled Paste on many Sun workstations) or Control-y inserts the contents of the clipboard at the position of the insertion cursor. This action is carried out by the command tk_textPaste.
trans-unit.target: 使用F18键（在许多Sun工作站上标记为Paste）或Control-y将剪贴板的内容插入到插入光标的位置。此操作由命令tk_textPaste执行。

trans-unit.source: The F20 key (labelled Cut on many Sun workstations) or Control-w copies the selection in the widget to the clipboard and deletes the selection. If there is no selection in the widget then these keys have no effect.
trans-unit.target: F20 键(在许多 Sun 工作站上标为 "剪切")或 Control-w 将小组件中的选区复制到剪贴板并删除选区。如果小组件中没有选区,则这些键没有效果。

trans-unit.source: The F20 key (labelled Cut on many Sun workstations) or Control-w copies the selection in the widget to the clipboard and deletes the selection. This action is carried out by the command tk_textCut. If there is no selection in the widget then these keys have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 使用F20键（在许多Sun工作站上标记为Cut）或Control-w将小部件中的选择复制到剪贴板并删除选择。此操作由命令tk_textCut执行。如果窗口小部件中没有选择，则这些键无效。

trans-unit.source: The Home and End keys scroll the listbox horizontally to the left and right edges, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 主键和结束键分别向左、右边缘水平滚动列表框。

trans-unit.source: The Home key adjusts the view to the top (left edge) of the document.
trans-unit.target: 主键可将视图调整到文档的顶部(左边缘)。

trans-unit.source: The Home key and Control-a move the insert cursor to the beginning of the entry and clear any selection in the entry. Shift-Home moves the insert cursor to the beginning of the entry and extends the selection to that point.
trans-unit.target: 按住原点键和Control-a键,将插入的光标移动到条目的开头,并清除条目中的任何选择。Shift-Home键将插入的光标移动到条目的开头,并将选择延伸到该点。

trans-unit.source: The Home key, or Control-a, will move the insertion cursor to the beginning of the entry and clear any selection in the entry. Shift-Home moves the insertion cursor to the beginning of the entry and also extends the selection to that point.
trans-unit.target: 按 "原点 "键或Control-a键,可将插入光标移至条目的开头,并清除条目中的任何选择。Shift-Home键将插入光标移动到条目的开头,并将选择扩展到该点。

trans-unit.source: The Home key, or Control-a, will move the insertion cursor to the beginning of the spinbox and clear any selection in the spinbox. Shift-Home moves the insertion cursor to the beginning of the spinbox and also extends the selection to that point.
trans-unit.target: 按 "原点 "键或Control-a键,将插入光标移至旋转框的起点,并清除旋转框中的任何选区。Shift-Home键可将插入光标移动到旋转框的开头,并将选区扩展到该点。

trans-unit.source: The Left and Right keys move the insert cursor one character to the left or right; they also clear any selection in the entry. If Left or Right is typed with the Shift key down, then the insertion cursor moves and the selection is extended to include the new character. Control-Left and Control-Right move the insert cursor by words, and Control-Shift-Left and Control-Shift-Right move the insert cursor by words and also extend the selection. Control-b and Control-f behave the same as Left and Right, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 左键和右键将插入光标向左或向右移动一个字符;它们还清除条目中的任何选择。如果在输入左键或右键时按下Shift键,那么插入光标就会移动,选择范围就会扩大到包括新的字符。Control-Left和Control-Right以字为单位移动插入光标,Control-Shift-Left和Control-Shift-Right以字为单位移动插入光标,同时扩展选区。Control-b和Control-f的行为分别与左和右相同。

trans-unit.source: The Left and Right keys move the insertion cursor one character to the left or right; they also clear any selection in the entry and set the selection anchor. If Left or Right is typed with the Shift key down, then the insertion cursor moves and the selection is extended to include the new character. Control-Left and Control-Right move the insertion cursor by words, and Control-Shift-Left and Control-Shift-Right move the insertion cursor by words and also extend the selection. Control-b and Control-f behave the same as Left and Right, respectively. Meta-b and Meta-f behave the same as Control-Left and Control-Right, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 左键和右键将插入光标向左或向右移动一个字符;它们还清除条目中的任何选区并设置选区锚。如果在输入左键或右键时按下Shift键,那么插入光标就会移动,选择范围也会扩大到包括新的字符。Control-Left和Control-Right以字为单位移动插入光标,Control-Shift-Left和Control-Shift-Right以字为单位移动插入光标,同时扩展选区。Control-b和Control-f的行为分别与左和右相同。Meta-b和Meta-f分别与Control-Left和Control-Right的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: The Left and Right keys move the insertion cursor one character to the left or right; they also clear any selection in the spinbox and set the selection anchor. If Left or Right is typed with the Shift key down, then the insertion cursor moves and the selection is extended to include the new character. Control-Left and Control-Right move the insertion cursor by words, and Control-Shift-Left and Control-Shift-Right move the insertion cursor by words and also extend the selection. Control-b and Control-f behave the same as Left and Right, respectively. Meta-b and Meta-f behave the same as Control-Left and Control-Right, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 左键和右键将插入光标向左或向右移动一个字符;它们还清除旋转框中的任何选区并设置选区锚。如果在按下Shift键的情况下输入左键或右键,那么插入光标就会移动,并扩展选区以包括新的字符。Control-Left和Control-Right以字为单位移动插入光标,Control-Shift-Left和Control-Shift-Right则以字为单位移动插入光标,同时扩展选区。Control-b和Control-f的行为分别与左和右相同。Meta-b和Meta-f分别与Control-Left和Control-Right的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: The Left and Right keys move the insertion cursor one character to the left or right; they also clear any selection in the text. If Left or Right is typed with the Shift key down, then the insertion cursor moves and the selection is extended to include the new character. Control-Left and Control-Right move the insertion cursor by words, and Control-Shift-Left and Control-Shift-Right move the insertion cursor by words and also extend the selection. Control-b and Control-f behave the same as Left and Right, respectively. Meta-b and Meta-f behave the same as Control-Left and Control-Right, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 左键和右键将插入光标向左或向右移动一个字符;它们还清除文本中的任何选区。如果在输入左键或右键时按下Shift键,那么插入光标就会移动,选择范围也会扩大到包括新的字符。Control-Left和Control-Right按字数移动插入光标,Control-Shift-Left和Control-Shift-Right按字数移动插入光标并扩展选区。Control-b和Control-f的行为分别与左和右相同。Meta-b和Meta-f分别与Control-Left和Control-Right的行为相同。

trans-unit.source: The Left and Right keys scroll the listbox view left and right by the width of the character 0. Control-Left and Control-Right scroll the listbox view left and right by the width of the window. Control-Prior and Control-Next also scroll left and right by the width of the window.
trans-unit.target: 左右键可将列表框视图左右滚动字符0的宽度。Ctrl-Left和Control-Right左右滚动列表框视图窗口的宽度。Control-Prior和Control-Next还会在窗口的宽度上左右滚动。

trans-unit.source: The Left key moves to the next menu to the left. If the current menu is a cascaded submenu, then the submenu is unposted and the current menu entry becomes the cascade entry in the parent. If the current menu is a top-level menu posted from a menubutton, then the current menubutton is unposted and the next menubutton to the left is posted. Otherwise the key has no effect. The left-right order of menubuttons is determined by their stacking order: Tk assumes that the lowest menubutton (which by default is the first one created) is on the left.
trans-unit.target: 左键移动到左边的下一个菜单。如果当前菜单是一个级联的子菜单,那么该子菜单将被取消张贴,当前菜单项成为父菜单的级联项。如果当前菜单是由menubutton发布的顶层菜单,那么当前menubutton将被取消发布,左边的下一个menubutton将被发布。否则该键没有效果。menubuttons的左右顺序是由其堆叠顺序决定的。Tk假定最低的menubutton(默认是第一个创建的)在左边。

trans-unit.source: The Next and Prior keys move the insertion cursor forward or backwards by one screenful and clear any selection in the text. If the Shift key is held down while Next or Prior is typed, then the selection is extended to include the new character.
trans-unit.target: 下一步和先导键将插入光标向前或向后移动一个屏幕,并清除文本中的任何选择。如果在输入 "下一步 "或 "上一步 "时按住Shift键,则选择范围会扩大到包括新的字符。

trans-unit.source: The PNG image loader allows the application of an additional alpha factor during loading, which is useful for generating images suitable for disabled buttons:
trans-unit.target: PNG图像加载器允许在加载过程中应用一个额外的阿尔法因子,这对于生成适合禁用按钮的图像非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The Prior and Next keys have the same behavior as mouse clicks over trough1 and trough2, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 上一个和下一个键的行为与分别在trough1和trough2上的鼠标单击相同。

trans-unit.source: The Prior and Next keys scroll the listbox view up and down by one page (the height of the window).
trans-unit.target: 先后键和下一步键将列表框视图上下滚动一页(窗口的高度)。

trans-unit.source: The Right key moves to the next menu to the right. If the current entry is a cascade entry, then the submenu is posted and the current menu entry becomes the first entry in the submenu. Otherwise, if the current menu was posted from a menubutton, then the current menubutton is unposted and the next menubutton to the right is posted.
trans-unit.target: 右键移动到右边的下一个菜单。如果当前条目是一个级联条目,那么子菜单被张贴,当前菜单条目成为子菜单的第一个条目。否则,如果当前菜单是由menubutton发布的,那么当前menubutton将被取消发布,右侧的下一个menubutton将被发布。

trans-unit.source: The Select key and Control-Space set the selection anchor to the position of the insertion cursor. They do not affect the current selection. Shift-Select and Control-Shift-Space adjust the selection to the current position of the insertion cursor, selecting from the anchor to the insertion cursor if there was not any selection previously.
trans-unit.target: 选择键和Control-Space将选择锚设置为插入光标的位置。它们不影响当前的选择。Shift-Select键和Control-Shift-Space键将选择调整到插入光标的当前位置,如果之前没有任何选择,则从锚点选择到插入光标。

trans-unit.source: The Space and Return keys invoke the active entry and unpost the menu.
trans-unit.target: 空格键和返回键调用活动条目,并解除菜单的张贴。

trans-unit.source: The TDBC specification requires database drivers to return a description of an error in the error code when an error occurs. The description is a string that has at least four elements: "TDBC
trans-unit.target: TDBC规范要求数据库驱动程序在发生错误时在错误代码中返回错误的描述。描述是至少包含四个元素的字符串：“ TDBC

trans-unit.source: The Tcl event loop should be running while an asynchronous connection is in progress, because it may have to do several connection attempts in the background. Running the event loop also allows you to set up a writable channel event on the socket to get notified when the asynchronous connection has succeeded or failed. See the vwait and the chan commands for more details on the event loop and channel events.
trans-unit.target: Tcl事件循环应在异步连接进行时运行，因为它可能必须在后台进行几次连接尝试。运行事件循环还允许您在套接字上设置可写通道事件，以在异步连接成功或失败时得到通知。有关事件循环和通道事件的更多详细信息，请参见vwait和chan命令。

trans-unit.source: The Tcl standard channels (stdin, stdout, and stderr) can be configured through this command like every other channel opened by the Tcl library. Beyond the standard options described above they will also support any special option according to their current type. If, for example, a Tcl application is started by the inet super-server common on Unix system its Tcl standard channels will be sockets and thus support the socket options.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过此命令配置Tcl标准通道（stdin，stdout和stderr），就像Tcl库打开的所有其他通道一样。除上述标准选项外，它们还将根据当前类型支持任何特殊选项。例如，如果某个Tcl应用程序是由Unix系统上通用的inet超级服务器启动的，则其Tcl标准通道将是套接字，因此支持套接字选项。

trans-unit.source: The Tk console text widget does not provide real standard IO capabilities. Under Tk, when redirecting from standard input, all applications will see an immediate end-of-file; information redirected to standard output or standard error will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Tk控制台文本部件不提供真正的标准IO功能。在Tk下,当从标准输入重定向时,所有的应用程序都会看到一个立即结束的文件;重定向到标准输出或标准错误的信息将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The Tk themed widget set is based on a revised and enhanced version of TIP #48 (http://tip.tcl.tk/48) specified style engine. The main concepts are described below. The basic idea is to separate, to the extent possible, the code implementing a widget's behavior from the code implementing its appearance. Widget class bindings are primarily responsible for maintaining the widget state and invoking callbacks; all aspects of the widget's appearance are controlled by the style of the widget (i.e. the style of the elements of the widget).
trans-unit.target: Tk主题窗口小部件集基于TIP＃48（http://tip.tcl.tk/48）指定的样式引擎的修订和增强版本。主要概念如下所述。基本思想是将实现小部件行为的代码与实现其外观的代码尽可能地分开。窗口小部件类绑定主要负责维护窗口小部件状态和调用回调。小部件外观的所有方面均由小部件的样式（即小部件的元素的样式）控制。

trans-unit.source: The Up and Down keys activate the next higher or lower entry in the menu. When one end of the menu is reached, the active entry wraps around to the other end.
trans-unit.target: 上和下键激活菜单中的下一个较高或较低的条目。当到达菜单的一端时,活动的条目将环绕到另一端。

trans-unit.source: The Up and Down keys move the insertion cursor one line up or down and clear any selection in the text. If Up or Right is typed with the Shift key down, then the insertion cursor moves and the selection is extended to include the new character. Control-Up and Control-Down move the insertion cursor by paragraphs (groups of lines separated by blank lines), and Control-Shift-Up and Control-Shift-Down move the insertion cursor by paragraphs and also extend the selection. Control-p and Control-n behave the same as Up and Down, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 上键和下键将插入光标向上或向下移动一行,并清除文本中的任何选择。如果在Shift键向下的情况下输入 "向上 "或 "向右 "键,那么插入光标就会移动,选择范围就会扩大到包括新的字符。Control-Up和Control-Down按段落移动插入光标(由空行分隔的行组),Control-Shift-Up和Control-Shift-Down按段落移动插入光标,并扩展选区。Control-p和Control-n的行为分别与上和下相同。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm falls back to the previous unknown handler when none of the found module files satisfy the request. If the request was satisfied the fall-back is ignored.

trans-unit.source: The alias mechanism has been carefully designed so that it can be used safely when an untrusted script is executing in a safe slave and the target of the alias is a trusted master. The most important thing in guaranteeing safety is to ensure that information passed from the slave to the master is never evaluated or substituted in the master; if this were to occur, it would enable an evil script in the slave to invoke arbitrary functions in the master, which would compromise security.
trans-unit.target: 别名机制经过精心设计,当一个不受信任的脚本在安全的从机中执行,而别名的目标是受信任的主机时,可以安全地使用该机制。保证安全最重要的是保证从机传递给主机的信息在主机中永远不会被评估或替换,如果出现这种情况,就会使从机中的邪恶脚本在主机中调用任意函数,从而影响安全。

trans-unit.source: The alternative mode of constraint control is enabled by setting configure -limitconstraints to true. With that configuration setting, all existing constraints other than those in the constraint list returned by configure -constraints are set to false. When the value of configure -constraints is set, all those constraints are set to true. The effect is that when both options configure -constraints and configure -limitconstraints are in use, only those tests including only constraints from the configure -constraints list are run; all others are skipped. For example, one might set up a configuration with
trans-unit.target: 通过将configure -limitconstraints设置为true 来启用约束控制的替代模式。使用该配置设置，除configure -constraints返回的约束列表中的约束以外，所有现有约束都将设置为false。设置configure -constraints的值时，所有这些约束均设置为true。结果是，当两个选项configure -constraints和configure -limitconstraints都使用时，仅运行那些仅包含configure -constraints列表中的约束的测试；所有其他的都被跳过。例如，可以使用以下命令设置配置

trans-unit.source: The amount in pixels that the tallest letter sticks up above the baseline of the font, plus any extra blank space added by the designer of the font.
trans-unit.target: 最高的字母高出字体基线的像素数,加上字体设计者添加的任何额外的空白空间。

trans-unit.source: The amount the characters in the font are slanted away from the vertical. Valid values for slant are roman and italic. A roman font is the normal, upright appearance of a font, while an italic font is one that is tilted some number of degrees from upright. The closest available slant to the one specified will be chosen. The default slant is roman.
trans-unit.target: 字体中字符的数量从垂直方向倾斜。倾斜的有效值为罗马和斜体。罗马字体是字体的正常，竖立外观，而斜体字体是从竖立倾斜一定角度的字体。将选择最接近指定倾斜度的可用倾斜度。默认斜率是roman。

trans-unit.source: The chain command searches through the class hierarchy for a slightly more generic (base class) implementation of a method or proc, and invokes it with the specified arguments. It starts at the current class context and searches through base classes in the order that they are reported by the "info heritage" command. If another implementation is not found, this command does nothing and returns the null string.
trans-unit.target: 连锁命令在类的层次结构中搜索方法或 proc 的一个稍为通用的(基类)实现,并使用指定的参数调用它。它从当前的类上下文开始,按照 "info heritage "命令报告的顺序搜索基类。如果没有找到另一个实现,这个命令什么也不做,并返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The chain command searches through the extendedclass hierarchy for a slightly more generic (base extendedclass) implementation of a method or proc, and invokes it with the specified arguments. It starts at the current extendedclass context and searches through base extendedclasses in the order that they are reported by the "info heritage" command. If another implementation is not found, this command does nothing and returns the null string.
trans-unit.target: chain 命令在扩展类层次结构中搜索一个方法或 proc 的略微通用的(基扩展类)实现,并使用指定的参数调用它。它从当前的扩展类上下文开始,按照 "info heritage "命令报告的顺序搜索基扩展类。如果没有找到另一个实现,这个命令什么也不做,并返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The chain command searches through the widget hierarchy for a slightly more generic (base widget) implementation of a method or proc, and invokes it with the specified arguments. It starts at the current widget context and searches through base widgets in the order that they are reported by the "info heritage" command. If another implementation is not found, this command does nothing and returns the null string.
trans-unit.target: 连锁命令在小组件层次结构中搜索方法或 proc 的略微更通用的(基础小组件)实现,并使用指定的参数调用它。它从当前小组件上下文开始,按照 "info 遗产 "命令报告的顺序搜索基础小组件。如果没有找到另一个实现,该命令什么也不做,并返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The command enforces the restriction that no path may be an ancestor directory of any other path on the list. If any of the new paths violates this restriction an error will be raised, before any of the paths have been added. In other words, if only one path argument violates the restriction then none will be added.

trans-unit.source: The command flushes all buffered output for the channel before the command returns, even if the channel is in non-blocking mode. It also discards any buffered and unread input. This command returns an empty string. An error occurs if this command is applied to channels whose underlying file or device does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 在命令返回之前,即使通道处于非阻塞模式,该命令也会刷新通道的所有缓冲输出。它也会丢弃任何缓冲和未读的输入。该命令返回一个空字符串。如果该命令应用于底层文件或设备不支持寻道的通道,则会出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The command prefix is executed in the global namespace, at the top of call stack, following the appending of arguments as described in the refchan manual page. Command resolution happens at the time of the call. Renaming the command, or destroying it means that the next call of a handler method may fail, causing the channel command invoking the handler to fail as well. Depending on the subcommand being invoked, the error message may not be able to explain the reason for that failure.
trans-unit.target: 如refchan手册页中所述，在添加参数之后，在调用堆栈顶部的全局名称空间中执行命令前缀。命令解析在调用时发生。重命名命令或销毁它意味着下一次调用处理程序方法可能会失败，从而导致调用处理程序的channel命令也将失败。根据所调用的子命令，错误消息可能无法解释该失败的原因。

trans-unit.source: The command returns a positive or negative integer corresponding to the number of items counted between the two indices. One such integer is returned for each counting option given, so a list is returned if more than one option was supplied. For example “.text count -xpixels -ypixels 1.3 4.5” is perfectly valid and will return a list of two elements.
trans-unit.target: 该命令返回与两个索引之间计数的项数相对应的正整数或负整数。对于给定的每个计数选项，将返回一个这样的整数，因此，如果提供了多个选项，则将返回一个列表。例如，“。text count -xpixels -ypixels 1.3 4.5”是完全有效的，它将返回两个元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: The command returns an empty string, and may generate an error if an error occurs while flushing output. If a command in a command pipeline created with open returns an error, chan close generates an error (similar to the exec command.)
trans-unit.target: 该命令返回一个空字符串，如果在刷新输出时发生错误，则可能会生成错误。如果使用open创建的命令管道中的命令返回错误，则chan close会生成错误（类似于exec命令）。

trans-unit.source: The command returns the ID of the posted job . This ID is used for subsequent tpool::wait, tpool::get and tpool::cancel commands to wait for and retrieve result of the posted script, or cancel the posted job respectively . If the optional ?-detached? argument is specified, the command will post a detached job . A detached job can not be cancelled or waited upon and is not identified by the job ID .
trans-unit.target: 该命令返回已发布作业的ID。此ID用于后续的tpool :: wait，tpool :: get和tpool :: cancel命令分别等待和检索已发布脚本的结果，或者分别取消已发布的作业。是否可选？指定参数，该命令将发布一个分离的作业。分离的作业无法取消或等待，并且无法由作业ID标识。

trans-unit.source: The command sets the maximum size of the Tcl call stack only. It cannot by itself prevent stack overflows on the C stack being used by the application. If your machine has a limit on the size of the C stack, you may get stack overflows before reaching the limit set by the command. If this happens, see if there is a mechanism in your system for increasing the maximum size of the C stack.
trans-unit.target: 该命令只设置Tcl调用栈的最大大小。它本身并不能防止应用程序使用的C栈的堆栈溢出。如果你的机器对C栈的大小有限制,你可能会在达到命令设置的限制之前就发生堆栈溢出。如果发生这种情况,请查看系统中是否有增加C栈最大大小的机制。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation of thread shared variables allows for easy and convenient access to data shared between different threads . Internally, the data is stored in Tcl objects and all package commands operate on internal data representation, thus minimizing shimmering and improving performance . Special care has been taken to assure that all object data is properly locked and deep-copied when moving objects between threads .

trans-unit.source: The embedded image's position on the screen will be updated as the text is modified or scrolled. Each embedded image occupies one unit's worth of index space in the text widget, and it may be referred to either by its position in the widget's index space, or the name it is assigned when the image is inserted into the text widget with
trans-unit.target: 嵌入图像在屏幕上的位置将随着文本的修改或滚动而更新。每个嵌入式图像在文本小组件中占据一个单位的索引空间,可通过其在小组件索引空间中的位置或图像插入到文本小组件中时分配的名称来参考。

trans-unit.source: The embedded window's position on the screen will be updated as the text is modified or scrolled, and it will be mapped and unmapped as it moves into and out of the visible area of the text widget. Each embedded window occupies one unit's worth of index space in the text widget, and it may be referred to either by the name of its embedded window or by its position in the widget's index space. If the range of text containing the embedded window is deleted then the window is destroyed. Similarly if the text widget as a whole is deleted, then the window is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入窗口在屏幕上的位置将随着文本的修改或滚动而更新,并且它将在进入和离开文本小组件的可见区域时被映射和取消映射。每个嵌入窗口在文本小组件中占据一个单位的索引空间,可通过其嵌入窗口的名称或其在小组件索引空间中的位置来引用。如果包含嵌入窗口的文本范围被删除,那么该窗口将被销毁。同样,如果文本小组件作为一个整体被删除,那么该窗口也会被销毁。

trans-unit.source: The end of a line in the underlying file or device is represented by a carriage return character followed by a linefeed character. As the input translation mode, crlf mode converts carriage-return-linefeed sequences to newline characters. As the output translation mode, crlf mode translates newline characters to carriage-return-linefeed sequences. This mode is typically used on Windows platforms and for network connections.
trans-unit.target: 基础文件或设备中行的末尾由回车符和换行符表示。作为输入转换模式，crlf模式将回车换行序列转换为换行符。作为输出转换模式，crlf模式会将换行符转换为回车换行符序列。此模式通常在Windows平台上用于网络连接。

trans-unit.source: The end of a line in the underlying file or device is represented by a single carriage return character. As the input translation mode, cr mode converts carriage returns to newline characters. As the output translation mode, cr mode translates newline characters to carriage returns.
trans-unit.target: 基础文件或设备中行的结尾由单个回车符表示。作为输入翻译模式，cr模式将回车符转换为换行符。作为输出转换模式，cr模式会将换行符转换为回车符。

trans-unit.source: The end of a line in the underlying file or device is represented by a single newline (linefeed) character. In this mode no translations occur during either input or output. This mode is typically used on UNIX platforms.
trans-unit.target: 底层文件或设备中的行末由一个换行符(换行)来表示。在这种模式下,无论是输入还是输出,都不会发生翻译。这种模式通常在UNIX平台上使用。

trans-unit.source: The end of a script file may be marked either by the physical end of the medium, or by the character, “\032” (“\u001a”, control-Z). If this character is present in the file, the wish application will read text up to but not including the character. An application that requires this character in the file may encode it as “\032”, “\x1a”, or “\u001a”; or may generate it by use of commands such as format or binary.
trans-unit.target: 脚本文件的结尾可以用介质的物理结尾或字符“ \ 032”（“-u001a”，control-Z）标记。如果文件中存在此字符，则愿望应用程序将读取文本，但不包括该字符。在文件中需要此字符的应用程序可以将其编码为“ \ 032”，“ \ x1a”或“ \ u001a”。或者可以使用诸如format或binary的命令生成它。

trans-unit.source: The end-of-file character for files is “\32” (^Z) for all platforms. The source command will read files up to this character. This restriction does not exist for the read or gets commands, allowing for files containing code and data segments (scripted documents). If you require a “^Z” in code for string comparison, you can use “\032” or “\u001a”, which will be safely substituted by the Tcl interpreter into “^Z”.
trans-unit.target: 在所有平台上，文件的文件结尾字符均为“ \ 32”（^ Z）。源命令将读取不超过此字符的文件。读取或获取命令不存在此限制，允许包含代码和数据段的文件（脚本文档）。如果在代码中需要“ ^ Z”进行字符串比较，则可以使用“ \ 032”或“ \ u001a”，它们将由Tcl解释器安全地替换为“ ^ Z”。

trans-unit.source: The ends of the selection can be adjusted by dragging with mouse button 1 while the Shift key is down. If the button is double-clicked before dragging then the selection will be adjusted in units of whole words.
trans-unit.target: 选区的两端可以通过在Shift键向下时用鼠标按钮1拖动来调整,如果在拖动前双击按钮,那么选区将以整字为单位进行调整。如果在拖动之前双击按钮,那么将以整字为单位调整选区。

trans-unit.source: The ends of the selection can be adjusted by dragging with mouse button 1 while the Shift key is down; this will adjust the end of the selection that was nearest to the mouse cursor when button 1 was pressed. If the button is double-clicked before dragging then the selection will be adjusted in units of whole words.

trans-unit.source: The ends of the selection can be adjusted by dragging with mouse button 1 while the Shift key is down; this will adjust the end of the selection that was nearest to the mouse cursor when button 1 was pressed. If the button is double-clicked before dragging then the selection will be adjusted in units of whole words; if it is triple-clicked then the selection will be adjusted in units of whole lines.
trans-unit.target: 选区的末端可以通过在Shift键向下时用鼠标按钮1拖动来调整;这将调整按钮1被按下时离鼠标光标最近的选区末端。如果在拖动前双击按钮,那么将以整字为单位调整选区;如果三击按钮,那么将以整行为单位调整选区。

trans-unit.source: The ensemble facility manages all of the part names and keeps track of unique abbreviations. Normally, you can abbreviate info complete to info comp. But if an extension adds the part info complexity, the minimum abbreviation for info complete becomes info complet.
trans-unit.target: 合奏设备管理所有零件名称，并跟踪唯一的缩写。通常，您可以将信息完整缩写为info comp。但是，如果一个扩展增加了部分信息的复杂性，对于最小缩写信息完全变成信息完满成功。

trans-unit.source: The ensemble facility not only automates the construction of composite commands, but it automates the error handling as well. If you invoke an ensemble command without specifying a part name, you get an automatically generated error message that summarizes the usage information. For example, when the info command is invoked without any arguments, it produces the following error message:
trans-unit.target: 合奏功能不仅可以自动执行复合命令的构造，还可以自动执行错误处理。如果在不指定零件名称的情况下调用ensemble命令，则会收到自动生成的错误消息，其中会概述使用情况信息。例如，在不带任何参数的情况下调用info命令时，它将产生以下错误消息：

trans-unit.source: The entire event pattern is surrounded by angle brackets. Inside the angle brackets are zero or more modifiers, an event type, and an extra piece of information (
trans-unit.target: 整个事件模式由角括号包围。在角括号内是零或多个修饰符、事件类型和一个额外的信息 (

trans-unit.source: The entire virtual event pattern is surrounded by double angle brackets. Inside the angle brackets is the user-defined name of the virtual event. Modifiers, such as Shift or Control, may not be combined with a virtual event to modify it. Bindings on a virtual event may be created before the virtual event is defined, and if the definition of a virtual event changes dynamically, all windows bound to that virtual event will respond immediately to the new definition.
trans-unit.target: 整个虚拟事件模式被双尖括号包围。尖括号内是虚拟事件的用户定义名称。诸如Shift或Control之类的修饰符不得与虚拟事件结合使用以对其进行修改。可以在定义虚拟事件之前创建对虚拟事件的绑定，并且如果虚拟事件的定义动态更改，则绑定到该虚拟事件的所有窗口将立即响应新定义。

trans-unit.source: The event blocking feature is implemented by creating and mapping a transparent window that completely covers the widget. When the busy window is mapped, it invisibly shields the widget and its hierarchy from all events that may be sent. Like Tk widgets, busy windows have widget names in the Tk window hierarchy. This means that you can use the bind command, to handle events in the busy window.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建和映射一个完全覆盖小部件的透明窗口来实现事件阻止功能。映射繁忙的窗口时，它会无形地屏蔽小部件及其层次结构，使其免受可能发送的所有事件的影响。与Tk窗口小部件一样，繁忙的窗口在Tk窗口层次结构中也具有窗口小部件名称。这意味着您可以使用bind命令来处理繁忙窗口中的事件。

trans-unit.source: The events Gravity and Reparent are not normally delivered to Tk applications. They are included for completeness.
trans-unit.target: Gravity和Reparent事件通常不会传递给Tk应用程序。为了完整起见，将它们包括在内。

trans-unit.source: The executor will search for tcl::mathfunc::sin using the usual rules for resolving functions in namespaces. Either ::tcl::mathfunc::sin or [namespace current]::tcl::mathfunc::sin will satisfy the request, and others may as well (depending on the current namespace path setting).
trans-unit.target: 执行程序将使用解析命名空间中功能的常用规则搜索tcl :: mathfunc :: sin。要么:: TCL :: mathfunc ::罪或[命名空间电流] :: TCL :: mathfunc ::罪将满足该请求，并且其他人可能以及（取决于电流的命名空间路径设置）。

trans-unit.source: The extendedclass

trans-unit.source: The fact that [incr Tcl] objects look like Tk widgets is no accident. [incr Tcl] was designed this way, to blend naturally into a Tcl/Tk application. But [incr Tcl] extends the Tk paradigm from being merely object-based to being fully object-oriented. An object-oriented system supports inheritance, allowing classes to share common behaviors by inheriting them from an ancestor or base class. Having a base class as a common abstraction allows a programmer to treat related classes in a similar manner. For example, a toaster and a blender perform different (specialized) functions, but both share the abstraction of being appliances. By abstracting common behaviors into a base class, code can be
trans-unit.target: [incr Tcl]对象看起来像Tk小部件的事实并非偶然。[incr Tcl]是以此方式设计的，可以自然地混入Tcl / Tk应用程序中。但是[incr Tcl]将Tk范式从仅基于对象扩展到完全面向对象。面向对象的系统支持继承，允许类通过从祖先或基类继承它们来共享常见行为。将基类作为通用抽象允许程序员以类似的方式对待相关的类。例如，一个烤面包机和一个搅拌器执行不同的（专门的）功能，但是两者共享作为设备的抽象。通过将常见行为抽象为基类，可以将代码

For example, the following code sets the value of x to 04:00:00 because the clock has changed in the interval in question.

trans-unit.source: The fifth part of a conversion specifier is a size modifier, which must be ll, h, or l. If it is ll it specifies that an integer value is taken without truncation for conversion to a formatted substring. If it is h it specifies that an integer value is truncated to a 16-bit range before converting. This option is rarely useful. If it is l it specifies that the integer value is truncated to the same range as that produced by the wide() function of the expr command (at least a 64-bit range). If neither h nor l are present, the integer value is truncated to the same range as that produced by the int() function of the expr command (at least a 32-bit range, but determined by the value of the wordSize element of the tcl_platform array).
trans-unit.target: 转换说明符的第五部分是大小修饰符，必须为ll，h或l。如果为ll，则它指定不带截断的整数值转换为格式化的子字符串。如果为h，则指定在转换之前将整数值截断为16位范围。此选项很少有用。如果为l，则指定整数值被截断到与expr命令的wide（）函数所产生的整数值相同的范围（至少64位范围）。如果既不是h也不是l如果存在，整数值将被截断到与expr命令的int（）函数所产生的值相同的范围（至少32位范围，但由tcl_platform数组的wordSize元素的值确定）。

trans-unit.source: The first form of annotation in text widgets is a tag. A tag is a textual string that is associated with some of the characters in a text. Tags may contain arbitrary characters, but it is probably best to avoid using the characters “ ” (space), +, or -: these characters have special meaning in indices, so tags containing them cannot be used as indices. There may be any number of tags associated with characters in a text. Each tag may refer to a single character, a range of characters, or several ranges of characters. An individual character may have any number of tags associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 文本小部件中注释的第一种形式是标签。标签是与文本中的某些字符相关联的文本字符串。标签可以包含任意字符，但是最好避免使用字符“”（空格），+或-：这些字符在索引中具有特殊含义，因此包含它们的标签不能用作索引。文本中可能有任意数量的与字符关联的标签。每个标签可以引用一个字符，一个字符范围或几个字符范围。单个字符可以具有与之关联的任何数量的标签。

trans-unit.source: The fourth portion of a conversion specifier is a precision, which consists of a period followed by a number. The number is used in different ways for different conversions. For e, E, and f conversions it specifies the number of digits to appear to the right of the decimal point. For g and G conversions it specifies the total number of digits to appear, including those on both sides of the decimal point (however, trailing zeroes after the decimal point will still be omitted unless the # flag has been specified). For integer conversions, it specifies a minimum number of digits to print (leading zeroes will be added if necessary). For s conversions it specifies the maximum number of characters to be printed; if the string is longer than this then the trailing characters will be dropped. If the precision is specified with * rather than a number then the next argument to the format command determines the precision; it must be a numeric string.
trans-unit.target: 转换说明符的第四部分是精度，它由一个句点和一个数字组成。该数字以不同的方式用于不同的转换。对于e，E和f转换，它指定显示在小数点右边的位数。对于g和G转换，它指定要显示的总位数，包括小数点两侧的位数（但是，除非已指定＃标志，否则小数点后的零仍将被忽略）。对于整数转换，它指定要打印的最小位数（如有必要，将添加前导零）。对于小号转换它指定要打印的最大字符数；如果字符串长于此长度，则尾部字符将被删除。如果精度是用*而不是数字指定的，那么format命令的下一个参数将确定精度。它必须是数字字符串。

trans-unit.source: The fundamental construct in [incr Tcl] is the class definition. Each class acts as a template for actual objects that can be created. Each object has its own unique bundle of data, which contains instances of the "variables" defined in the class. Special procedures called "methods" are used to manipulate individual objects. Methods are just like the operations that are used to manipulate Tk widgets. The "button" widget, for example, has methods such as "flash" and "invoke" that cause a particular button to blink and invoke its command.
trans-unit.target: [incr Tcl]中的基本构造是类定义。每个类都充当可创建的实际对象的模板。每个对象都有自己独特的数据包，其中包含在类中定义的“变量”的实例。称为“方法”的特殊过程用于操纵单个对象。方法就像用于操作Tk小部件的操作一样。例如，“ button ”小部件具有诸如“ flash”和“ invoke”之类的方法，这些方法会导致特定按钮闪烁并调用其命令。

trans-unit.source: The fundamental construct in [incr Tcl] is the class definition. Each class acts as a template for actual objects that can be created. The class itself is a namespace which contains things common to all objects. Each object has its own unique bundle of data which contains instances of the "variables" defined in the class definition. Each object also has a built-in variable named "this", which contains the name of the object. Classes can also have "common" data members that are shared by all objects in a class.
trans-unit.target: [incr Tcl]中的基本构造是类定义。每个类都充当可创建的实际对象的模板。类本身是一个命名空间，其中包含所有对象共有的内容。每个对象都有自己独特的数据束，其中包含在类定义中定义的“变量”的实例。每个对象还具有一个名为“ this”的内置变量，其中包含对象的名称。类还可以具有由类中所有对象共享的“公共”数据成员。

trans-unit.source: The fundamental construct in [incr Tcl] is the extendedclass definition. Each extendedclass acts as a template for actual objects that can be created. The extendedclass itself is a namespace which contains things common to all objects. Each object has its own unique bundle of data which contains instances of the "variables" defined in the extendedclass definition. Each object also has a built-in variable named "this", which contains the name of the object. Extendedclasses can also have "common" data members that are shared by all objects in a extendedclass.
trans-unit.target: [incr Tcl]中的基本构造是扩展类定义。每个扩展类都充当可创建的实际对象的模板。ExtendedClass本身是一个名称空间，其中包含所有对象共有的内容。每个对象都有其自己唯一的数据包，其中包含扩展类定义中定义的“变量”的实例。每个对象还具有一个名为“ this”的内置变量，其中包含对象的名称。扩展类还可以具有扩展类中所有对象共享的“公共”数据成员。

trans-unit.target: 测试套件的基本元素是单独的测试命令。我们从几个例子开始。

trans-unit.source: The fundamental threading model in Tcl is that there can be one or more Tcl interpreters per thread, but each Tcl interpreter should only be used by a single thread which created it . A "shared memory" abstraction is awkward to provide in Tcl because Tcl makes assumptions about variable and data ownership . Therefore this extension supports a simple form of threading where the main thread can manage several background, or "worker" threads . For example, an event-driven server can pass requests to worker threads, and then await responses from worker threads or new client requests . Everything goes through the common Tcl event loop, so message passing between threads works naturally with event-driven I/O, vwait on variables, and so forth . For the transfer of bulk information it is possible to move channels between the threads .
trans-unit.target: Tcl中的基本线程模型是每个线程可以有一个或多个Tcl解释器，但是每个Tcl解释器只能由创建它的单个线程使用。在Tcl中很难提供“共享内存”抽象，因为Tcl对变量和数据所有权进行了假设。因此，此扩展支持一种简单的线程形式，其中主线程可以管理多个后台线程或“工作”线程。例如，事件驱动的服务器可以将请求传递到工作线程，然后等待工作线程或新客户端请求的响应。一切都经过通用的Tcl事件循环，因此线程之间的消息传递自然可以与事件驱动的I / O，vwait一起工作变量等。为了传输大量信息，可以在线程之间移动通道。

trans-unit.source: The grid geometry manager lays out its slaves in three steps. In the first step, the minimum size needed to fit all of the slaves is computed, then (if propagation is turned on), a request is made of the master window to become that size. In the second step, the requested size is compared against the actual size of the master. If the sizes are different, then spaces is added to or taken away from the layout as needed. For the final step, each slave is positioned in its row(s) and column(s) based on the setting of its
trans-unit.target: 网格几何管理器用三个步骤来布置它的从属窗口。第一步,计算出适合所有从属窗口的最小尺寸,然后(如果打开传播),向主窗口发出请求,使其成为该尺寸。第二步,将请求的大小与主窗口的实际大小进行比较。如果尺寸不同,则根据需要在布局中添加或删除空格。在最后一步中,每个从属窗口都会根据其设置的行和列的位置来定位。

trans-unit.source: The grid geometry manager normally computes how large a master must be to just exactly meet the needs of its slaves, and it sets the requested width and height of the master to these dimensions. This causes geometry information to propagate up through a window hierarchy to a top-level window so that the entire sub-tree sizes itself to fit the needs of the leaf windows. However, the grid propagate command may be used to turn off propagation for one or more masters. If propagation is disabled then grid will not set the requested width and height of the master window. This may be useful if, for example, you wish for a master window to have a fixed size that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 网格几何管理器通常会计算出一个母版必须有多大才能完全满足其从属的需求，并将其设置为所需的宽度和高度。这会导致几何信息通过窗口层次结构向上传播到顶层窗口，从而使整个子树本身的大小都可以满足叶窗口的需求。但是，网格传播命令可用于关闭一个或多个主机的传播。如果禁用传播，则网格将不会设置主窗口的请求宽度和高度。例如，如果您希望主窗口具有指定的固定大小，这可能会很有用。
